clinical_study.brief_title: Preoperative and Peroperative Comparison Between 3D Spine Reconstructions
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Preoperative 3D Spine Reconstruction With the EOS System and Peroperative 3D Spine Reconstruction With SURGIVISIO

brief_summary.textblock:
The objective is to collect data from a per-operative navigation system called SURGIVISIO during scoliosis surgeries. A research program is in progress in order super-impose pre-operative 3D reconstructions of the spine performed with the EOS system on the per-operative 3D reconstructions performed with the SURGIVISIO system.
The purpose of the study is to collect the pre and per operatives data in order to perform the research and development program.

primary_outcome.measure: Comparison between the shape of of the spine in supine position in the OR with the Surgivisio system and the 3D shape with the 3D pre-operative planning with the EOS
primary_outcome.description: Comparison in degrees of the pre-operative Cobb angle with the EOS system and the per-operative spine reconstruction with the Surgivisio System.

secondary_outcome.description: The Haussdorff distance will be computed (mm)
The Haussdorff distance will be computed (mm)

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of respiratory movements on image quality
secondary_outcome.description: The ratio between respiratory movement and the recalage error (no unit) will be computed

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of the "recalage" accuracy between preop planning and CBCT perop.
secondary_outcome.description: The root mean square error will be computed between the preop and perop 3D shape of the spine.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of angular measurements between preop and perop images
secondary_outcome.description: Comparison of angular measurements (degrees) of the spine curves between preop and perop images

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of angular measurements between preop and postop images
secondary_outcome.description: Comparison of angular measurements (degrees) of the spine curves between preop and postop images

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of angular measurements between 1st erect postop Xrays and + 6 months postop Xrays.
secondary_outcome.description: Comparison of angular measurements (degrees) of the spine curves between 1s erect postop and 6 months postop images

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation angular measurements between 1st erect postop Xrays and the preop planning
secondary_outcome.description: Comparison of angular measurements (degrees) of the spine curves between 1rst erect postop and preop images

intervention.description: Each patient will undergo a spine fusion for a evolutive idiopathic scoliosis with the help of the surgivisio system.

study_pop.textblock: This study will involve only patients with adolescent idiopathic scoliosis planned for a fusion surgery

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients aged between 12 and 20
- Adolescent idiopathic scoliosis
- Fusion surgery planned
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient under "tutelle" or privation of liberty
- Opposition of parents or patient
